message: I'm excited to offer you this great product, and I think it's a fair price of $14000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm looking forward to hearing back from you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, but I have to consider my own needs. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $12500. This is a fair price that I think we can both agree on.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $11800, but that's as high as I can go. Can you consider this offer?
I appreciate your honesty about your budget, and I'm willing to make one more concession. I can do $13000, but that's as low as I can go. This is a great deal for you, and I hope you'll consider it.
I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $12200, but that's as high as I can go. Can you consider this offer?
